column4: is there a better way to connect to a ubuntu computer remotely from windows 7 than vnc?
if you're looking for ease of use, and there's a person at each pc... google "Teamviewer"
as long as you set teamviewer to run on startup, and set a "constant password", teamviewer would still work
repo is downi guess ( i got the same thing)... just try teamviewer, as long as its running ont he "remote" PC, and you know the username password for it.. you should have no problem.
